data.name: ActivityGroupsContainerNameRequired
data.value: ActivityGroupsContainerName is required.

data.name: AllVersionsAndDeletesModeNotSupported
data.value: AllVersionsAndDeletes mode is not supported in the current SDK version. Use LatestVersion mode or upgrade the Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos SDK.

data.name: ConnectionStringRequired
data.value: ConnectionString is required.

data.name: ContainerIdRequired
data.value: ContainerId is required.

data.name: ContainerNameRequired
data.value: ContainerName is required.

data.name: CosmosDbUsesTransactionalBatches
data.value: Cosmos DB uses transactional batches within a single partition. Use ExecuteBatchAsync instead.

data.name: DatabaseIdRequired
data.value: DatabaseId is required.

data.name: DatabaseNameRequired
data.value: DatabaseName is required.

data.name: DocumentIdPropertyNull
data.value: Document id property is null.

data.name: EitherConnectionStringOrAccountEndpointRequired
data.value: Either ConnectionString or both AccountEndpoint and AccountKey must be provided.

data.name: FailedToParsePositionFromBase64
data.value: Failed to parse position from base64

data.name: GrantsContainerNameRequired
data.value: GrantsContainerName is required.

data.name: IndexManagementViaContainerPolicy
data.value: Index management in Cosmos DB is done through container indexing policy.

data.name: InvalidPositionFormat
data.value: Invalid position format

data.name: MaxBatchSizeMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: MaxBatchSize must be greater than zero.

data.name: MaxRecoveryAttemptsMustBeAtLeastOne
data.value: MaxRecoveryAttempts must be at least 1.

data.name: MaxWaitTimeMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: MaxWaitTime must be greater than zero.

data.name: NoContainerNameSpecified
data.value: No container name specified.

data.name: PollIntervalMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: PollInterval must be greater than zero.

data.name: ProcessorNameRequired
data.value: ProcessorName is required.

data.name: RecoveryAttemptDelayCannotBeNegative
data.value: RecoveryAttemptDelay cannot be negative.

data.name: StaleContinuationTokenDetected
data.value: The CosmosDB CDC processor detected a stale continuation token position that cannot be recovered.

data.name: UseCloudNativeMethodsForCosmosDbOperations
data.value: Use cloud-native specific methods (GetByIdAsync, CreateAsync, etc.) for Cosmos DB operations.

data.name: UseCloudNativeMethodsInsteadOfExecuteDocument
data.value: Use cloud-native specific methods (GetByIdAsync, CreateAsync, etc.) instead of ExecuteDocumentAsync for Cosmos DB.

data.name: UseCloudNativeMethodsGeneric
data.value: Use cloud-native specific methods for Cosmos DB operations.

data.name: UseExecuteBatchAsyncForBatchOperations
data.value: Use ExecuteBatchAsync for batch operations in Cosmos DB.

data.name: UseExecuteBatchAsyncForTransactionalOperations
data.value: Use ExecuteBatchAsync for transactional operations in Cosmos DB.

data.name: UseExecuteBatchAsyncOrBulkExecution
data.value: Use ExecuteBatchAsync or configure AllowBulkExecution for bulk operations in Cosmos DB.

data.name: UseQueryAsyncForAggregations
data.value: Use QueryAsync with aggregation SQL for Cosmos DB aggregations.

data.name: OnPositionResetCallbackRequired
data.value: When using CosmosDbStalePositionRecoveryStrategy.InvokeCallback, the OnPositionReset callback must be configured.

data.name: PropertyIsRequired
data.value: {0} is required.

data.name: PropertyMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: {0} must be greater than zero.

data.name: PropertyMustBeAtLeastOne
data.value: {0} must be at least 1.

data.name: PropertyCannotBeNegative
data.value: {0} cannot be negative.
